name: Erlyn
advice: Cool the burn under running water for 10 minutes. Cover with sterile non-fluffy dressing.

name: Maple
advice: Encourage coughing. If choking persists, perform abdominal thrusts.

name: Pezzy
advice: Clean the wound, apply pressure to stop bleeding, then cover with a bandage.

name: Tashi
advice: Immobilize the injured area. Do not attempt to straighten the limb. Apply a splint if trained, and seek medical help immediately.

name: Queen
advice: Perform abdominal thrusts until the object is dislodged or help arrives.

name: Iki
advice: Clean the wound, apply pressure to stop bleeding, then cover with a bandage.

name: Cloud
advice: Clean the wound, apply pressure to stop bleeding, then cover with a bandage.
